resources.string: Simon was created by Suzanne Kersten and Harrison Welch for their CSCI 4020 class, taught by the esteemed Dr. Nicholson.

Upon starting a game, Simon will start a pattern by lighting up one of the four colored buttons and playing a sound unique to that button. Your goal is to match that pattern that Simon plays, with each correct sequence adding another button to the end of the sequence. 

Example: If Simon lights up the blue button, you press the blue button. Then Simon lights up blue button and the red button, so you press the blue button and the red button in that order, continuing on until you make a mistake in the sequence. 

Your score at the end is however many buttons were in the last sequence successfully completed.
